original_text: Jesus went up a mountain. He chose some men and he asked them to go there with him. So they met together with him there.
korean_text: 또 산에 오르사 자기가 원하는 자들을 부르시니 나아온지라

sentences.original_text: and he asked them to go there with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들에게 자기와 함께 그곳에 가라고 요청하셨다

sentences.original_text: So they met together with him there
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그곳에서 그와 함께 모였다
